html:
PC Number Date Chapter Chapter Year Bill Dept
 2024-12952024-12-09ECCC, HC
ActCanadian Environmental Protection Act, 1999
SubjectRegulations Amending the Formaldehyde Emissions from Composite Wood Products Regulations
PrecisRegulations Amending the FORMALDEHYDE EMISSIONS FROM COMPOSITE WOOD PRODUCTS REGULATIONS in order to (1) remove the accreditation requirement for laboratories conducting routine quality control formaldehyde emissions testing; (2) clarify record-keeping requirements for finished goods along the composite wood products supply chain; (3) maintain alignment with the Act to minimize international trade barriers; and (4) make minor amendments to provide clarification on issues brought forward by stakeholders.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2024-0256 Publication Date: 2024-12-18
AttachmentsAttachment
precis: Regulations Amending the FORMALDEHYDE EMISSIONS FROM COMPOSITE WOOD PRODUCTS REGULATIONS in order to (1) remove the accreditation requirement for laboratories conducting routine quality control formaldehyde emissions testing; (2) clarify record-keeping requirements for finished goods along the composite wood products supply chain; (3) maintain alignment with the Act to minimize international trade barriers; and (4) make minor amendments to provide clarification on issues brought forward by stakeholders.
